class.name: LeaderboardData
class.brief_description: Data returned by the [LeaderboardsClient] when requesting a leaderboard or a user score and rank.
class.description: Data returned by the [LeaderboardsClient] when requesting a leaderboard or a user score and rank.

members.member: The rank of the user in the leaderboard. (Eg. 1, 2, 3, etc.)
The score of the user in the leaderboard. (Eg. 100, 200, etc.)
The timestamp of the score in the leaderboard.
The name of the user in the leaderboard. It corresponds to the n user data.
